document_data.caption: Map showing the Alaoreum and surrounding area ''circa'' 1370 DR.
document_data.name: Mountains of the Alaoreum
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Alaoreum''' were a collection of northern peaks in the [[Orsraun Mountains]] set apart from the rest of the range by [[Treefall Pass]]. The peaks overlooked the [[Gulthmere Forest]].

The Mountains of the Alaoreum were notable for containing the volcano [[Mount Andrus]], which was sacred to the god [[Talos]], and the [[Dwarf|dwarven]] mine of [[Ironfang Deep]].
